notes: Extended run_pap_models with MI-pooled analyses for HYP-001/002 and generated exploratory outputs (seed 20251016) while survey weights remain pending.

backlog.description: Await survey administrator response on weight/strata metadata so the PAP can be frozen with the validated design.
Build executable PAP ordered-logit runner for HYP-003 and validate under SRS assumption.
Extend run_pap_models workflow to HYP-001 and HYP-002 with MI handling prior to PAP freeze.
Draft MI robustness scripts for HYP-001/002 (reduced-aux MI vs complete-case) ahead of PAP freeze.

next_actions.description: Follow up with survey administrators regarding official weight and design metadata.
Draft MI robustness scripts for HYP-001/002 (reduced-aux and complete-case comparisons).
